form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Application for Adjustment of Status to Lawful Permanent Resident ( 01-2304

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 Block 1. - Information About Alien Beneficiary (Continued) 21. Address in the United States where beneficiary will reside (City) (State) 1619 Ulupii P1. Kailua Hawaii 96734 22. Address at which beneficiary is presently residing (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Town or city) (Province or State) B356 Tran Van Lanh-Cho Nho-Thu Duc-S. Vietnam 23. If beneficiary is in the United States, give the following information concerning beneficiary: a. He last arrived in the U.S.on b. He last arrived in U.S. as c. Show date beneficiary's stay expired or will (Month) (Day) (Year) (Visitor, student, exchange alien, crewman, stowaway, etc.) expire as shown on his Form I-94 or I-95: N/A N/A N/A d. Name and address of present employer e. Date alien began this employment N/A N/A 24. Check the appropriate box below and furnish the information required for the box checked: Beneficiary will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in Saigon, S. Vietnam (CITY IN FOREIGN COUNTRY) (FOREIGN COUNTRY) Beneficiary is in the United States and will apply for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident in the office of the Immigration and Naturalization Service at (CITY) (STATE) If the application for adjustment of status is denied, the beneficiary will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in SAIGON S. VIETNAM (CITY IN FOREIGN COUNTRY) (FOREIGN COUNTRY) Block II. - Information About Petitioner 25. My name is (Last) (First) (Middle) 26. Other names used; (including maiden name if married woman) JOHNSON Therese Webster BUI, Phi Yen 27. I reside in the United States at (C/O, if appropriate) (Apt. No.) (Number and street) AT (Town or city) (State) (ZIP Code) 1619 Ulupii P1. Kailua Hi 96734 28. Address abroad (if any) (Number and street) (Town or city) (Province) (Country) None 8)SPJ-sats 29. I was born: (Month) (Day) (Year) In: (Town or city) (State or Province) (Country) Sept 1st 1947 Hue VIETNAM 30: If you are a citizen of the United States, give the following: a. Citizenship was acquired: (Check one) through birth in the U.S. through parents through naturalization through marriage (1) If acquired through naturalization, give name under which naturalized, number of naturalization certificate, and date and place of naturalization: Therese Webster Johnson - #9270623 - 8 August 1969 -Honolulu Hawaii (2) If acquired through parentage or marriage, have you obtained a certificate of citizenship in your own name based on such acquisition ? n/a (a) If so, give number of certificate and date and place of issuance: (b) If not, submit evidence of citizenship in accordance with Instruction 4a. (2). b. Have you or any person through whom you claim citizenship ever lost United States citizenship? no If so, attach detailed explanation on separate sheet. 31. If you are a lawful permanent resident alien of the United States, give the following: a. Alien Registration Number: b. Date, place, and means of admission for lawful permanent residence A n/a n/a c. Have you ever lost status as a lawful permanent resident alien? no If so, explain: (If you are married to a citizen of the United States, read instruction 1b carefully) 32. Have you attached all required documents (see instruction No. 4) ? Yes Block 11. Oath or Affirmation of Petitioner I swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this petition signed by me and that the statements herein are true and correct. Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 9th day of april A.D. 19. H at Honolulu Hawaii Signature of petitioner (See Instruction No. 6) Therem W. Johnn (SEAL) My commission expires 3/24/18 (SIGNATURE ADMINISTERING OATH) Brilley OF OFFICER Kewaring Notory-Pobtic First Judicial Circuit (TITLE) State of Hawaii Block IV. Signature of Person Preparing Form, Petitioner My Commission expires If Other Than I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the petitioner and is based on all information of which I have any knowledge.
